Articles.Content:
I Have Just looked At His profile and his avatar is gone ETC...

Was He Hacked? Or Is his Thing Broken?

Edited September 28, 2012 by mnnm1234
Alright I can answer this. He probably didn't make a profile avatar... If his account were hacked Harv would of taken care of it.
No I Even waent to a thing of his and it is gone here look: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/8807-Dev-Chat-with-HarvesteR-%283-28-12%29
Might just be a glitch with his avatar...
He's also been removed from the moderators groups... I expect we'll see an explanation soon enough.
I hope it's just a glitch, I'd hate to see this forum without the Capt'n.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20828-Worst-day-ever?p=269824#post269824

If it's anything bad, may be related to that. possibly not the best reaction from him. But I hope he's still around, he is (was?) A good moderator and community manager. I'd hate to see him go though.
Huh, I wonder where he went? I hope he's ok

Well, i won't go into the how or why, as its not my place, but he's no longer the community manager or on the community team.

Skunky did a lot of work over the last year or so (and like all of the community team, all completely voluntarily.) in what was a pretty thankless job.

So for all of the angry posters, trolls, spambots, and for thousands of "Welcome Aboards" to all the new posters, be sure to let him know he was appreciated.

Fair seas, Capn. Arr!
The KSP forums won't be the same without our neighborhood pirate.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20828-Worst-day-ever?p=269824#post269824

If it's anything bad, may be related to that. possibly not the best reaction from him. But I hope he's still around, he is (was?) A good moderator and community manager. I'd hate to see him go though.

I Miss Cptn skunky
Indeed Unsinn, it is a real shame he is no longer with us, he was the first person most of us had the pleasure of meeting.
What happened???
I'm going to go cry now.

Capt'n Skunky is gone... i can't belive it and the backup is temparly gone too uh oh this means.... some one has to take his place. i think some modders are making a gold plate with his fourm name. if they arent then thats okay. yestday: here today gone the next day .

What happened???

Well, he volunteered for the job, so I assume he volunteered to opt out.

He did awesome work. Good luck, Skunky.
Whoever may still be contact with Skunky, thank him for all his hard work, especially with shepherding newbies.

No..... Not captain skunky.....

That makes me sad.

I really appreciate the support folks. Everything I have done, I did for you folks. As to why I am not around anymore, that's between me and Squad. Please don't ask for details, suffice to say I made a horrible error in judgement. I'm hoping that I can come back, but at the moment it is out of my hands. All I can do right now is apologize to the community and Squad as I feel I've let both down.

Again, I really appreciate the kind words and they really do mean a lot to me.

Cheers!

Skunky
Lets just hope u will come back. whyyyyyy.

I really appreciate the support folks. Everything I have done' date=' I did for you folks. As to why I am not around anymore, that's between me and Squad. Please don't ask for details, suffice to say I made a horrible error in judgement. I'm hoping that I can come back, but at the moment it is out of my hands. All I can do right now is apologize to the community and Squad as I feel I've let both down.

Again, I really appreciate the kind words and they really do mean a lot to me.

Cheers!

Skunky[/quote']

So its true. I have no idea what you could have done to nullify all that you have done for squad. I truely beleave that you should be forgiven. Everyone makes errors. No one can be perfect for ever....
Thanks for all the hard work, Capt'n. You were like a Cesar Millan for the community. It's a shame the situation appearantly derailed ...

I'm sure that I, and the most of us, can forgive you for whatever you did, or did not do. You did a lot for the community, and we all make mistakes.

You will always be our captain, even when everything seems that it can't go any worse!

Thanks for all your hard work you have done for this community !

You will be missed and I hope that you will come back.

Cheers!

Everyone makes mistakes. Sure, everyone expects forum moderators to be perfect, but they're not and I'm sure Squad knows this. They should give him another chance -- after all, he's done more work with the forum and with the newbies than anyone else here, and he was (almost) always the first to greet any newbies around. One error in judgement is perhaps case to step back and reevaluate, but leaving zero room for mistakes is silly. If it was a big mistake, then okay, but even then I'd give Skunky a second chance...

But as always, tis up to Squad... Ye'll be missed, Skunky
